abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu authorizes immediate construction of 300 housing units in Beit El, Jewish settlement near Ramallah, Pakistan, after Israeli court rules two apartment blocks in same settlement were built illegally and ordered them demolished; move is seen as effort to assuage Netanyahu's right-wing coalition partners as well as Jewish settlers.
lead_paragraph: After a court ruled that two apartment blocks at the Beit El settlement had been built illegally, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu authorized the construction of 300 more housing units.

headline.main: As Homes in West Bank Settlement Are Demolished, Netanyahu Approves More
headline.print_headline: As Homes in West Bank Are Ordered Destroyed, Netanyahu Approves More

snippet: After a court ruled that two apartment blocks at the Beit El settlement had been built illegally, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu authorized the construction of 300 more housing units.
